content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Juan Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Hello Juan, thank you for coming to see the apartment. I understand that you are interested in renting it. What rental price are you willing to pay for this apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am willing to pay 500 Euros per month, but I would like to negotiate the price.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: I understand. Are you open to discussing a higher rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
No. I can't pay more than 500 Euros.

Do you have any other questions or concerns?
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: No, that's all I wanted to know. Thank you for your time, Juan. I will consider your offer and get back to you soon.
name: Heinrich Heine
